actions.name: Impervious

cost.trigger: The user would be given [Stage Change] effect, a [Minor Affliction], a [Major Affliction], or dealt damage from an effect from something other than itself.

actions.description:
The user would be given [Stage Change] effect, a [Minor Affliction], a [Major Affliction], or dealt damage from an effect from something other than itself.
Effect: The triggering effect or Affliction is not applied, and the user takes no damage from triggering effect.

system.description:
The user would be given [Stage Change] effect, a [Minor Affliction], a [Major Affliction], or dealt damage from an effect from something other than itself.
Effect: The triggering effect or Affliction is not applied, and the user takes no damage from triggering effect.
